```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a dataset.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data!

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update the names in "litters_df".

```{r}
litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```
